start.description: Index of the first item to return

end.description: Index of the last item to return

file.description: Path to a file (not a directory) to be added to the playlist

genreid.description: Identification of a genre from the AudioLibrary

type.description: Pixel aspect ratio where 1.0 means square pixel
Vertical shift 1.0 means shift to bottom
An unknown item does not have any additional information.
An item known to the database has an identification.
A movie item has a title and may have a release year.
A tv episode has a title and may have an episode number, season number and the title of the show it belongs to.
A music video has a title and may have an album and an artist.
A song has a title and may have an album, an artist and a track number.
A picture has a file path.
A PVR channel is either a radio or tv channel and has a title.

file.description: The url encoded multipath string combining all paths of the source

paths.description: The individual paths of the media source

sourceid.description: The ids of sources with songs of the genre

items.description: Requesting the (song)genreid/genre, roleid/role or sourceid fields will result in increased response times
Requesting the songgenres, artistid and/or sourceid fields will result in increased response times
Requesting the genreid, artistid, albumartistid and/or sourceid fields will result in increased response times
The artist and the role they contribute to a song
The various roles contributed by an artist to one or more songs
Requesting the cast, ratings, showlink, streamdetails, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast, ratings, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast, ratings, streamdetails, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
Requesting the streamdetails, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times

lasthashcheck.description: Last time source was checked for changes

mediapath.description: Media source path that identifies the item

dynpath.description: An experimental property for debug purposes, often same as mediapath but when different gives the actual file playing that should also be in file property

size.description: Size of the file in bytes

sorttokens.description: Articles ignored during sorting when ignorearticle is enabled.

language.description: Current language code and region e.g. en_GB
